full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
---

## Brief Overview

The Government of Canada issues a tender announcement for the procurement of one growth chamber. The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is in need of a growth chamber for a specific purpose.

## Tender Details
---

* **Reference Name (French)**: Chambre d'incubation
* **Tender ID (English)**: cb-843-75222331
* **Solicitation Number (English)**: 2024-00388
* **Publication Date**: December 27, 2023
* **Closing Date and Time**: January 12, 2024, at 4:00 PM EST
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: The lowest price will be the determining factor for awarding the contract.

## Description of Goods or Services Required
---

The Government of Canada is procuring a growth chamber to meet specific needs. The Canadian Food Inspection Agency requires one (1) growth chamber.

## Supporting Documentation
---

The following documents are available for download:

* [Tender Notice (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28384/2024-00388-npp.pdf) (English)
* [Tender Notice (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28384/2024-00388-npp.pdf) (French)

## Contact Information
---

If you require additional information or clarification regarding this tender announcement, please contact:

* **Name**: Xuan Zhang
* **Email**: [xuan.zhang@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:xuan.zhang@inspection.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (343) 575-4587

**Note:** The above contact information is only for inquiries regarding this tender announcement. Please do not use this contact to submit bids or proposals.  if you have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out.

The term "Chambre d'incubation" was not translated at all, I simply translated it to "Growth Chamber" to match the other text structure. Please check if you want the translated version in the french text.
